name: Highborne
description: Being part of a Highborne community means you were born into a life of elegance, opulence, and prestige within the upper echelons of society.

creation.name: Inheritance
creation.description: Take an extra handful of gold at character creation.

features.name: Inheritance
features.description: You have advantage on any rolls you make when consorting with nobles, negotiating prices, or leveraging your reputation to get what you want.

features.name: Steady
features.description: You have advantage on traversing dangerous cliffs and ledges, navigating harsh environments, and survival knowledge.

name: Seaborne
description: Being part of a Seaborne community means you grew up on or near a large body of water.

features.name: Safe Harbor
features.description: Once per session, when you take a short or long rest, you may take one additional downtime action.

name: Underborne
description: Being part of an Underborne community means that you're from a subterranean society.

features.name: Low Light Living
features.description: When you are in an area with low light or heavy shadow, you have advantage on rolls to hide, investigate, or perceive details.

name: Wildborne
description: Being part of a wildborne community means you were raised by a clan deep within the forest.

features.name: Lightfoot
features.description: Your movement is natureally silent. Sain advantage on any Action Rolls you make to move without being heard. Spend a **Hope** to also grant this ability to an ally while they stay within close range of you.

name: Loreborne
description: Being part of a Loreborne community means you were brought up in a place that favored strong academic or political prowess.

features.name: Well-read
features.description: You have advantage on any rolls you make that deal with the history, culture, or politics of a prominent person or place.

name: Orderborne
description: Being part of an Orderborne community means you were raised in a place of great discipline or faith, and uphold a set of principles that reflect your experience there.

features.name: Dedicated
features.description: Record three sayings or values your upbringing instilled in you. Once per short rest, when you describe how you're embodying one of these principles through your current action, you may roll with a **d20** as your Hope Die instead of a **d12**.

name: Wanderborne
description: Being part of a Wanderborne community means that you were raised as a nomad, not having a permanent home but experiencing a wide variety of cultures.

features.name: Nomadic Pack
features.description: Add a Nomadic Pack to your inventory. Once per session, you may spend a **Hope** to reach into this pack and pull out a common item that is useful in this situation. Work with the GM to figure out what this item is.

name: Slyborne
description: Being part of a Slyborne community means growing up in the underbelly of society, surrounded by criminals and con artists.

features.name: Scoundrel
features.description: You have advantage on any rolls where you're negotiating with criminals, detecting lies, or finding a safe place to hide.
